sqlMap.select: SELECT b.name || '(' || b.email || ')' as usernames, a.resource_seq as resource_seq ,a.resource_types as resource_types ,a.user_seq as user_seq ,a.db_seq as db_seq ,a.name as name ,a.shared_type as shared_type ,a.restapi_yesno as restapi_yesno ,a.restapi_uri as restapi_uri ,a.restapi_key as restapi_key ,a.description as description ,a.create_time as sqliteCreate_time ,a.delyn as delyn FROM user_db_resource a, tadpole_user b WHERE a.user_seq = b.seq AND a.db_seq = #seq# AND a.resource_types in ('ERD', 'SQL') AND a.delYn = 'NO' ORDER BY a.resource_types, a.name

SELECT b.name || '(' || b.email || ')' as usernames, a.seq as seq ,a.user_seq as user_seq ,a.group_seq as group_seq ,a.user_db_resource_seq as user_db_resource_seq ,a.datas as datas ,a.delyn as delyn ,a.create_time as sqliteCreate_time FROM user_db_resource_data a, tadpole_user b WHERE a.user_seq = b.seq AND user_db_resource_seq = #resource_seq# order by a.seq

select a.*, b.seq role_seq, b.ROLE_ID role_id, c.ext1, c.ext2, c.ext3, c.ext4, c.ext5, c.ext6, c.ext7, c.ext8, c.ext9, c.ext10 from tadpole_db a, tadpole_user_db_role b, user_db_ext c where a.group_name = #group_name# AND a.seq = b.db_seq AND a.seq = c.seq AND b.user_seq = #user_seq# AND a.delyn = 'NO' AND b.delyn = 'NO' AND a.is_visible = 'YES' AND b.terms_of_use_starttime <= #thisTime# AND b.terms_of_use_endtime >= #thisTime#

select a.*, b.seq role_seq, b.ROLE_ID role_id, c.ext1, c.ext2, c.ext3, c.ext4, c.ext5, c.ext6, c.ext7, c.ext8, c.ext9, c.ext10 from tadpole_db a, tadpole_user_db_role b, user_db_ext c where a.seq = b.db_seq AND a.seq = c.seq AND b.user_seq = #user_seq# AND a.delyn = 'NO' AND b.delyn = 'NO' AND a.is_visible = 'YES' AND b.terms_of_use_starttime <= #thisTime# AND b.terms_of_use_endtime >= #thisTime#

SELECT b.seq, b.user_seq, b.login_ip, b.connet_time sqliteConnet_time, b.disconnect_time sqliteDisconnect_time FROM tadpole_user a, login_history b WHERE a.email = #email# AND a.seq = b.user_seq AND strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', b.connet_time) BETWEEN #startTime# AND #endTime# ORDER BY b.connet_time DESC LIMIT 1000
